statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 13 \\ -4 \\ 18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ -10 \\ 4 \\ -14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ -6 \\ 0 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ -30 \\ 24 \\ -44 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
